language.dpinstTitle: Generic ADB Driver Installer for the Dell Venue 7 / Venue 8 / Acer Iconia A1-830

language.finishTitle: Finished installing Generic ADB Driver Dell Venue 7 / Venue 8 / Acer Iconia A1-830
